---
title: Challenge Portal
subtitle: B2AI Azure Data Enclave
---

The B2AI Challenge Portal currently offers a small collection of tools and services.

- Check **[Ares](/ares/)** to characterize data and assess OMOP data quality.
- Use **[Atlas](/atlas/)** to conduct scientific analyses and construct cohorts.
- Open **[Jupyter Lab](/lab/)** to write code in Python, and R in a custom sandbox environment.
- Visit the **[Azure ML Workspace](/mlw/)** to train models and execute machine learning workflows.
